Author: GitHub
Description:
Open source isn't just about code; it's a human sport. In this short, we discuss why supporting community health is critical for globally distributed teams. Learn why funding programs need to go beyond just financial support and foster real connections between maintainers to prevent misunderstandings.

#OpenSource #Coding #SoftwareDevelopment

Title: The missing piece in open source sustainability
